title: X and Y position as particle moves between plates

content.question: A positively charged particle is moving horizontally when it enters the uniform electric field between two parallel charged plates, as shown in the figure above. Which of the following could show the x and y positions of the particle as a function of time t ?

choices.label: Each option shows two graphswithorigin at lower left labeled O.  Both graphs in each option have the horizontal axis labeled t.  In each option, the vertical axis of the graph on the left is labeled x, and the vertical axis of the graph on the right is labeled y. The graph on the left is a horizontal line starting on the vertical axis above the origin.  The graph on the right is a curve that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and curves down to end on the positive horizontal axis.

Each option shows two graphswithorigin at lower left labeled O.  Both graphs in each option have the horizontal axis labeled t.  In each option, the vertical axis of the graph on the left is labeled x, and the vertical axis of the graph on the right is labeled y.The graph on the left is a horizontal line starting on the vertical axis above the origin. The graph on the right is a straight line that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and moves down to end on the positive horizontal axis.

Each option shows two graphswithorigin at lower left labeled O.  Both graphs in each option have the horizontal axis labeled t.  In each option, the vertical axis of the graph on the left is labeled x, and the vertical axis of the graph on the right is labeled y. The graph on the left is a straight line that starts at the origin and slants up.  The graph on the right is a curve that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and curves down to end on the positive horizontal axis.

Each option shows two graphswithorigin at lower left labeled O.  Both graphs in each option have the horizontal axis labeled t.  In each option, the vertical axis of the graph on the left is labeled x, and the vertical axis of the graph on the right is labeled y.The graph on the left is a straight line that starts at the origin and slants up.  The graph on the right isa straight line that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and moves down to end on the positive horizontal axis.

content.answer: Each option shows two graphswithorigin at lower left labeled O.  Both graphs in each option have the horizontal axis labeled t.  In each option, the vertical axis of the graph on the left is labeled x, and the vertical axis of the graph on the right is labeled y. The graph on the left is a straight line that starts at the origin and slants up.  The graph on the right is a curve that starts on the vertical axis above the origin and curves down to end on the positive horizontal axis.

skill.text: 2.D: Predict new values or factors of change of physical quantities using functional dependence between variables.
